element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm renames an alphanumerical field of the attribute table associated with a vector layer.

element.name: INPUT
element.text: The input vector layer of which we want to rename a field

element.name: FIELD_TO_RENAME
element.text: The name of the field to rename

element.name: NEW_FIELD_NAME
element.text: The new name of the field. The length of the new name must not exceed 10 characters.

element.name: RESULT
element.text: The output vector layer with the renamed field
